item.description: The Awakening the Dreamer Symposium comes to the Sustainable Farm School one week from today! 1 to 4 p.m. at Flamig Farm in West Simsbury on March 18th, invite your friends and family because this is a benefit for our school! The cost is $15 per person, but families and students will receive a discount. Register online or in person at the event. Free delicious and organic refreshments will be served. Check the website for more details on the symposium: http://www.awakeningt...
item.name: Awakening the Dreamer Symposium to benefit the Sustainable Farm School; 3/18
